description: The job title is SDE Intern, and the description is as follows: SDE Intern: Remote MERN Stack Developer Intern role, responsible for designing and developing high-quality web/mobile applications using MongoDB, ExpressJS, ReactJS, and NodeJS. Tasks include code maintenance, scalability, feature development, and suggesting enhancements. Skills required: MongoDB, ReactJS, JavaScript, Web Development, NodeJS.SKILLS: MongoDB, ReactJS, JavaScript, Web Development, NodeJS.
